overview: Ok, Trendsetters!  This is Rodney Rude blazing across the stage and coming at you live in your lounge room with a huge crock of over the top comedy, served up with generous lashings of verbal manure and good old bad taste. And heâ€™s brought with him his side-kick mate Rodney Half-Rude followed up the rear by Harry Muff, the Diver.
title: Rodney Rude - Rude Rides Again
